name: To Infinity
description:
In To Infinity, a challenging parkour game, overcome challenging and various obstacles as an astronaut, get ready to taste the heavy price of your mistakes, push your limits and reach the top!

STORY


To Infinity is an experience where you witness the adventures of a schizophrenic astronaut. The astronaut takes a spaceship, escapes from Earth and starts looking for other planets where he can live. Meanwhile, he travels thousands of light years in space and witnesses the epic view of the universe.

TECHNOLOGY


While making To Infinity, Unreal Engine 5.0, a new generation game engine, was used.

LANDSCAPES


Since To Infinity is a game that aims for players to witness the epic view of the universe during the course, care has been taken to prepare the views as realistic as possible.

MECHANICS


- Walk
- Running
- Jump
- Crouching
- Climbing

GRAPHICS


As TWISTED UNIVERSE, we attach great importance to graphics, so we used Unreal Engine 5, the last generation game engine, in To Infinity. We offer players a visual feast with much more realistic shadows and lighting.

PHYSICS


To Infinity includes sections where you do physics-based parkour.
